title: [WII]Demontage.Wii.+.WiiKey.Installation-TPB
description:
The WiiKey for Nintendo Wii is made by the famous xenoGC team, responsible for the xenoGC Gamecube line of mod chips, and now, with their WiiKey, Wii owners can enjoy all the benefits of a team of great developers with a truly upgradeable Nintendo Wii Mod chip. 

The WiiKey comes ready to use, and offers an alsmot wireless installation. Simply position the WiiKey on the Wii Mainboard, and do some small soldering, and it will be held in place. 4 wires are needed to fully connect the WiiKey to the mainboard, and once installed, you&#039;ll be up and playing. Installation takes just 15-20 minutes for even novice installers (yes, it really is that easy) Supports multi disc games, allows playing of all Wii DVD-R and DVD+R discs (play just like originals, put the game in and play) and supports Gamecube backup games (just like originals) as well booting different region Wii Backup games (NTSC Region) and boots different region Gamecube Games as well. It even has a built in audio fix for games using streaming, and no patching is required.



Product Details:
Fully upgradeable via DVD/disc (future proof, expect cool features to come)
Direct boot of Wii backups (like originals)
Direct boot of GC backups (like originals)
Boots different region GC games/backups.
Boots different NTSC/PAL region Wii games/backups.
Supports multi-disc games.
Supports DVD-R and DVD+R.
Built-in audio fix (for games using streaming, no patch required)
Stealth mode.
4 wires & quick solder interface.
Compact design, best quality components, rock solid high speed controller.
Professional ESD packing.


REMEMBER: WiiKey only works with S/N LEH-122xxxx to LEH-1347xxxxx!
